details.sectionContent: We are going to control a robot using your voice command.

Personal robotic assistants help reducing the manual efforts being put by human in their dayto-day tasks . We develop a voice controlled personal assistant robot. The human voice command is given to the robotic assistant remotely, by using a smart mobile phone. The robot can perform different movements like, turn, start/stop operations. The voice commands are processed in real-time, using an online cloud server. The speech signal command converted to text form is communicated to the robot over a Bluetooth network. The personal assistant robot is developed on a micro-controller based platform

voice controlled robot involves the operation of robot with the signals sent from your smart phone (voice signal). This workshop helps participants to under-stand the concept and use of Arduino, accelerometer, and l293d motor driver IC.
Student will gain practical hands on experience with following components:  Arduino nano, l293d motor driver, and Bluetooth. Step by step development of robot and establish of communication.
Robot development component. Embedded robotics development board. Batteries. Tools.
